name: ICY CLEANERS
description:
It is winter and the snow covers your village, find the best path you can follow to clean all the snow with your neighbours without running out of steps!

Made for the Mini Jame Gam #15

The WebGL version of this game could have some bugs, so we recommend to download the Windows version.

Thank you, we appreciate any feedback.

Developed by: 

Programmers:  Maciej Draus and Fran Vargas Boza

Visual:  Juan Carlos Camuña Cotta
